description.author: Salesforce
text: A component that serves as a container with slots for custom content insertion, including header, main content, and footer areas.

elements.name: headerStartContent
elements.description: Represents the content of the named slot for the beginning part of the header

elements.name: headerContent
elements.description: Represents the content of the named slot for the main part of the header

elements.name: headerEndContent
elements.description: Represents the content of the named slot for the end part of the header

elements.name: mainContent
elements.description: Represents the default content slot for the main body of the component

elements.name: footerContent
elements.description: Represents the content of the named slot for the footer area
